name: Dual Prison
description:
Escape the prison while you transform between police and prisoner against your will.
Made for the Global Gamejam 2022.

Controls:
Arrow keys or WASD to move
Z or Spacebar to jump
X or E to hide or activate buttons

This game supports gamepad.

Credits:
Programming: Moisés Peláez, Gabriel Díaz, Miguel González
Audio: Gabriel Díaz, Moisés Peláez
Art: JJAlba, Kosena
